name: MISTGABEL FLUCHT
description:
You're an alien that crash landed on a farmer's field and now the farmers will hunt you with their pitchforks!

Avoid getting held up by these rocks and holes while you're fleeing!

Title screen controls:

  • (D-Pad) Left/Right - Change the volume
  • (D-Pad) Up/Down - Change the window scale
  • Alt+Enter - Toggle fullscreen

Controls:

  • Space / A/B - Continue
  • Arrow Keys / D-Pad - Move the alien

Credits:

  • Programming - Ever, ZeHa
  • Graphics - ZeHa, Ever
  • Sounds - Ever
  • Music - ZeHa

Note for Linux users: You need to install the "love" package, run with "love ".
